### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE transaction_history (
  transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
  amount NUMERIC,
  description TEXT,
  category TEXT
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = 100.50 WHERE transaction_id = 1;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  amount DECIMAL,
  transaction_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  registration_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE categories (
  category_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  category_name VARCHAR(50),
  description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE budgets (
  budget_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  category_id INT,
  amount DECIMAL,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE transactions SET amount = 1000 WHERE user_id = 123 AND transaction_date >= '2022-01-01'
